Text.Page:
Our body of knowledge regarding noctenium is sorely lacking, my friend. We require additional data.

The Enlightened Union needs more samples of raw noctenium, in order to formulate conclusions. Search the territories and gather no less than three specimens of noctenium ore. Bring them back to me.
This noctenium ore is ideal for our data. Thank you, friend. I will pass the specimens on to the union's researchers.
